    • Constructor Detail

      • ChessPiece

        public ChessPiece(java.lang.String inDisplayName,
                  CPValue inValue,
                  boolean inColor,
                  int inYpos,
                  int inXpos)
        Chess Piece Creation
        Parameters:
        inDisplayName - The display name of the chess piece
        inValue - The value of the chess piece (Pawn, Rook, Queen, etc...)
        inColor - a boolean value, true representing black pieces, false representing white
        inYpos - the Y position (or row) where the chess piece exists on the chess board
        inXpos - the X position (or column) where the chess pieces exists on the chess board

        Checks if the position specified would be a possible move for the type of piece this is.
        Parameters:

        col - Column position to look at

      • getValidMoves

        public java.util.ArrayList<BoardPosition> getValidMoves()
        getValidMoves() - returns an Array List of BoardPositions. This represents all of the possible moves the chess piece can make
        Returns:
